Key Match Events: Cole Palmer scored his first senior England goal from a penalty.
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a volley to make it 2-0.
Harry Kane scored a close-range finish to complete the scoring for England.
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate decided to introduce Harry Kane, James Maddison, and Jack Grealish from the bench.
Debuts were given to Jarrad Branthwaite and Adam Wharton.
Post-Match Reflections: Conor Gallagher was singled out for post-match praise from Southgate.
Southgate reflected on the attacking riches of the team despite defensive concerns.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The atmosphere was subdued in the first half, apart from when Kieran Trippier and Jordan Pickford got on the ball.
The crowd tried to rouse England after the restart, significantly increasing noise levels.
